categories: Category:Star Wars: The Clone Wars voice actors

nodes.text: Ray Stevenson (born May 25, 1964) is a Northern Irish-English actor who voiced Gar Saxon in the third season of Star Wars Rebels and in the revival of Star Wars: The Clone Wars.

His notable roles include Legionary Titus Pullo in HBO's series Rome, Volstagg in the Marvel Cinematic Universe's Thor trilogy, and Frank Castle in Punisher: War Zone. One of his earliest film roles included the knight Dagonet in King Arthur (2004), appearing with Joel Edgerton, Keira Knightley and Mads Mikkelsen.
